manifest_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: hadoop-namenode
  labels:
    app: hadoop
    unit: namenode
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hadoop
      unit: namenode
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hadoop
        unit: namenode
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - name: hadoop-init
        image: mpolatcan/hadoop:3.2.1-java8
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        command:
        - /bin/bash
        args:
        - -c
        - $(INIT_SCRIPT)
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: hadoop-init
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /hadoop-state
          name: hadoop-nn-volume
      containers:
      - name: hadoop-namenode
        image: mpolatcan/hadoop:3.2.1-java8
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: hadoop-namenode
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /home/hduser
          name: hadoop-nn-volume
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9870
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 2
          failureThreshold: 3
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9870
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 2
          failureThreshold: 3
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
violation_text: container "hadoop-init" does not have a read-only root file system
